sentences.english: This is the place where the clericals have their meetings.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是教權主義支持者們開會的地方。

sentences.english: Having educational love, and defend the learning power of students.
sentences.chinese: 以教育愛出發，維護學生的受教權。

sentences.english: China is a country under the domination of the patriarchal religion power.
sentences.chinese: 中國歷史上曾是一個被宗法式教權統治的國家。

sentences.english: This is the place where the clerical had their meetings.
sentences.chinese: 這裏是教權主義支持者們開會的地方。

sentences.english: The right to education is recognized as a basic human right by the United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 受教權被聯合國認定是一種基本人權。
